title: Please Put Gnar In Free Champ Rotation or on SALE!!
body: Riot pls put gnar in free Champ or on sale.... i wanna play him{{champion:150}}

replies.body: Chances are you'll have enough IP to buy him before you see him on the free champ rotation.
Yeah Probably Im saving up for him.. but there are so much other champs that are useful.. e.g{{champion:412}}
I feel like I know you from somewhere but I don't know where

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WORfaBUA,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2014-12-25T01:26:55.901+0000)
>
> I feel like I know you from somewhere but I don't know where

I'm pretty famous if I do say so myself.
Gnar is the weirdest way to spell Pantheon.

He already was on the free champ rotation before. for 2 weeks in a row because he was bugged out and disabled for 2 days.

New champs usually go on sale about 6 months after release (so February)
